Function reference

Package

rmo-package
rmo: A package for the Marshall–Olkin distribution.

Sampling functions

rmo()
Sample from Marshall–Olkin distributions
rexmo()
Sample from exchangeable Marshall–Olkin distributions
rextmo()
Sample from extendible Marshall–Olkin distributions
rpextmo()
Sample from parametrized extendible MO distributions

Drop-in parameter factories

valueOf() uexIntensities() intensities() exIntensities() exQMatrix()
Virtual superclass for Bernstein functions
ex_intensities_constant() intensities_constant() ex_intensities_linear() intensities_linear() ex_intensities_armageddon() intensities_armageddon() ex_intensities_poisson() intensities_poisson() ex_intensities_alpha_stable() intensities_alpha_stable() ex_intensities_exponential() intensities_exponential() ex_intensities_gamma() intensities_gamma() ex_intensities_pareto() intensities_pareto() ex_intensities_inverse_gaussian() intensities_inverse_gaussian()
Convenience functions to MO parameters

Bernstein functions

Virtual classes

valueOf() uexIntensities() intensities() exIntensities() exQMatrix()
Virtual superclass for Bernstein functions
levyDensity() valueOf(<LevyBernsteinFunction>)
Virtual superclass for Bernstein functions with nonzero Lévy density
stieltjesDensity() valueOf(<CompleteBernsteinFunction>)
Virtual superclass for complete Bernstein functions

Bernstein function arithmetics

initialize(<ScaledBernsteinFunction>) show(<ScaledBernsteinFunction>) valueOf(<ScaledBernsteinFunction>)
Class for scaled Bernstein functions
initialize(<CompositeScaledBernsteinFunction>) show(<CompositeScaledBernsteinFunction>) valueOf(<CompositeScaledBernsteinFunction>)
Class for composite scaled Bernstein functions
initialize(<SumOfBernsteinFunctions>) show(<SumOfBernsteinFunctions>) valueOf(<SumOfBernsteinFunctions>)
Class for sums of two Bernstein functions
initialize(<ConvexCombinationOfBernsteinFunctions>) show(<ConvexCombinationOfBernsteinFunctions>) valueOf(<ConvexCombinationOfBernsteinFunctions>)
Class for convex combinations of Bernstein functions

Boundary cases

initialize(<LinearBernsteinFunction>) show(<LinearBernsteinFunction>) valueOf(<LinearBernsteinFunction>)
Class for linear Bernstein functions
initialize(<ConstantBernsteinFunction>) show(<ConstantBernsteinFunction>) valueOf(<ConstantBernsteinFunction>)
Class for (almost) constant Bernstein functions

Algebraic Bernstein functions

initialize(<ParetoBernsteinFunction>) show(<ParetoBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<ParetoBernsteinFunction>)
Class for Pareto Bernstein functions
initialize(<AlphaStableBernsteinFunction>) show(<AlphaStableBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<AlphaStableBernsteinFunction>) stieltjesDensity(<AlphaStableBernsteinFunction>)
Class for the \(\alpha\)-stable Bernstein function
initialize(<InverseGaussianBernsteinFunction>) show(<InverseGaussianBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<InverseGaussianBernsteinFunction>) stieltjesDensity(<InverseGaussianBernsteinFunction>)
Class for Inverse Gaussian Bernstein function
initialize(<ExponentialBernsteinFunction>) show(<ExponentialBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<ExponentialBernsteinFunction>) stieltjesDensity(<ExponentialBernsteinFunction>)
Class for Exponential Bernstein functions

Logarithmic Bernstein functions

initialize(<GammaBernsteinFunction>) show(<GammaBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<GammaBernsteinFunction>) stieltjesDensity(<GammaBernsteinFunction>)
Class for Gamma Bernstein functions

Other Bernstein Functions

initialize(<PoissonBernsteinFunction>) show(<PoissonBernsteinFunction>) levyDensity(<PoissonBernsteinFunction>)
Class for Poisson Bernstein functions
